steps.title: Wound Assessment
steps.subtitle: Evaluate depth, length, location, and contamination of wound.

steps.title: Control Bleeding
steps.subtitle: Apply direct pressure with sterile gauze or clean cloth.

steps.title: Irrigate if Needed
steps.subtitle: Clean wound with sterile saline if heavily contaminated.

steps.title: Apply Dressing
steps.subtitle: Use sterile gauze pad secured with tape or bandage.

steps.title: Tetanus Consideration
steps.subtitle: Determine tetanus vaccination status for dirty wounds.

steps.title: Monitor for Infection
steps.subtitle: Watch for signs of redness, swelling, warmth, discharge.
